Blog.post: To tell you the truth, i know most guys secreats. They just told me knowing that i could be trust... autally i didn't even bother to tell anyone about their secreats. =p .

well...S is the leader of this old folks home events. However she didn't do anything and Y and i had to be the leader of this event. We racking our brains of what games can the old folks play. When Y called my teacher and told her what would happen if S is angry, She said too bad , i totally got a shock but M doesn't who i told him what happen. He think it is naturally.

collecting report book is my worse day. well ... i done pretty well for all subjects expect for english. Why do parents have to compare us with other ppl child, with my hatred friend, J. I feel like telling them, fine fine, she is so great so what, then ask her to be her child. I nowadays would rather hang out as late as i can or cope in my room. My family doesn't understand me abit. LIKE to compare! Fine! I also can compare our parents! FREAK ! why can't they understand... i have stress too! i have tons of tuictions, tons of school stuff, and dancing class which i enjoy the most yet. I decided... COPE MYSELF. THEY don't understand abit. Not at all...
yeah .. i forget... on father's day i got my own tv.. brusting with joy haha ...

tiMe nOw: 10.25pm wEll.. i am going to take 5 mins to write this dariy.... i am so freaking out cause of joanne...she gave me freaking testi... well...I AM NOT GOING TO ACCEPT IT!!! one day i might end up in hosipital cause of blood vessels brust... my pool tacnic is improving though... well.. i end here... 10.30pm to 11.30 .. i mUST study geo... i am stressing myself.. belive me...

Quite SUrprsing worx... i cam online k told me he going tomorrow !! Aw.. i want to go ... haha ... i didn't company him before ... maybe i will like back K don't like M. IMPOSSIBLE .. haha.. i won't like someone who i like before, that is the werid me. I think cZ like either me or yoke ting .. hm... M bah ... i don't have feelings for him le ... thinking of him make me sad. He doesn't hab feelings for me ... he doesn't look at the special way... BUT I DO ... he ... just good friend for now bah... thinking of that make me sad ... so i think i don't hab feeling for him le bah... maybe he find me fan bah ... AW ... i wanting for hp ... for free in coming call...waiting ... FOR NEXT YEAR p.s.... I FOLLOW MY HW TIMETABLE >.

today i went to old folks home... first was the performance... it was bad... we didn't plan at all AND teacher said it was good maybe cause JOANNE MOTHER WAS THERE. alright... after the lame performance... we went for a break for 3 hours. We went to JZ plaza mac. hahax... poor CZ ... i stuff him with my french fries =p. then after luch we went shopping then went back to the home. I saw them playing football... i tell you THEIR AIMING WAS PERFECT THAT IT ALMOST HIT ME 3 TIMES !!! ... next part to help the old folks was to do exercise, and will have SORE THOART ... blah.. haha.. i helped washes the dishes too bahx..
